attributes.action:
Legal
Requirement for all push bikers to wear a helmet
attributes.additional_details:
In an accident where my son landed onto his head from a huge height , whilst wearing a helmet he ended up in a coma
And on life
Support , every emergency service
Made the same
Comment without his helmet he would not be with us today !! Helmets are a life
Saving piece of equipment !! Everybody should be made
To wear one
attributes.background:
Helmets are a life saving piece of equiptment that should be made a
Legal
Requirement whilst riding a push bike !!!
